Key.Original: %3 to %2 : Requesting immediate air transport at grid %1
Key.English: %3 to %2 : Requesting immediate air transport at grid %1
Key.French: De %3 pour %2: Demandons évacuation aérienne aux coordonées %1

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : Roger, helicopter on the way to grid %1
Key.English: %2 to %3 : Roger, helicopter on the way to grid %1
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Bien reçu, hélicoptère en route vers coordonées %1

Key.Original: %3 to %2 : Ok pilot, take us to grid %1
Key.English: %3 to %2 : Ok pilot, take us to grid %1
Key.French: De %3 pour %2: Ok pilote, destination coordonnées %1

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : Roger destination set to grid %1, let's go!
Key.English: %2 to %3 : Roger destination set to grid %1, let's go!
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Bien reçu. Coordonnées %1, en route
De %1 pour %2: Nous sommes arrivés %2, Godspeed!

Key.Original: Someone else has already called the taxi, air transport unavailable
Key.English: Someone else has already called the taxi, air transport unavailable
Key.French: Quelqu'un d'autre a déjà appelé le Taxi, taxi indisponible

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : we are %1 km from target, E.T.A. one mike, get ready.
Key.English: %2 to %3 : we are %1 km from target, E.T.A. one mike, get ready.
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Nous sommes à %1 km de l'objectif, E.T.A. une minute, tenez vous prêts.
De %2 pour %1: Demandons annulation du transport.

Key.Original: %1 to %2 : Roger, transport cancel we're RTB
Key.English: %1 to %2 : Roger, transport cancel we're RTB
Key.French: De %1 pour %2: Bien reçu, hélicoptère annulé

Key.Original: %1 we have a problem your transport was shot down at grid %2 !
Key.English: %1 we have a problem your transport was shot down at grid %2 !
Key.French: Nous avons un problème %1, votre transport a été abattu aux coordonnées %2!
